name: Planetventure
description:
Playing as Fred your task is to discover new alien species and collect artifacts on abandoned planets. To get more species and artifacts you need to use the artifacts you already found to solve puzzles. The game takes place in a post apocalyptic universe. Fred just started working for a shady character named U. N. Owen. He was hired to discover species on five planets. Fred can collect space acorns along his adventure. Space acorns can be spent at Scruffy's Shop for Adventurers. Scruffy sells new space ships and suits.

Features
  • Solve puzzles to discover new species and artifacts
  • Explore free roam worlds
  • Adventure can be completed in multiple paths
  • Many game settings
  • Story with full voice acting
  • Gamepad support
Requirements
  • Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Android 2.3 or up
  • 2 GB Ram

Android Permissions: Bluetooth
